name: Brass: Birmingham
description: An economic strategy masterpiece set during the Industrial Revolution. Build networks, develop industries, and navigate a changing market in canal and rail eras.

name: Pandemic Legacy: Season 1
description: An epic cooperative experience where your decisions carry over to future games. Watch the world change as you fight to contain four deadly diseases over a 12-month campaign.

name: Gloomhaven
description: A massive legacy-style dungeon crawl with tactical card-driven combat. Explore a persistent world, unlock new characters, and make choices that permanently alter the city.

name: Ark Nova
description: Plan and design a modern, scientifically managed zoo. Support conservation projects and house diverse animals in this complex, high-interaction card game.

name: Twilight Imperium (4th Ed)
description: The definitive game of galactic conquest and diplomacy. Lead your civilization to the throne of Mecatol Rex through war, trade, and political maneuvering.

name: Dune: Imperium
description: A blend of deck building and worker placement inspired by the Dune universe. Influence the Great Houses and lead your troops to victory on the desert planet.

name: Terraforming Mars
description: Compete as giant corporations to make Mars habitable. Raise the temperature, oxygen levels, and ocean coverage while building your industrial empire.

name: Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion
description: A standalone, accessible prequel to Gloomhaven. Perfect for newcomers, featuring a tutorial-driven campaign that builds complexity as you play.

name: War of the Ring (2nd Ed)
description: Relive the epic struggle of Tolkienâ€™s Lord of the Rings. One player leads the Free Peoples while the other commands the Shadow Armies in an asymmetric war.

name: Star Wars: Rebellion
description: A game of cat and mouse on a galactic scale. The Galactic Empire must find and destroy the Rebel base, while the Rebels use hit-and-run tactics to stir an uprising.

name: Spirit Island
description: Powerful spirits must protect their island from colonizing Invaders. A complex, highly strategic cooperative game where every spirit has unique powers.

name: Gaia Project
description: The sci-fi successor to Terra Mystica. Colonize the galaxy, research technologies, and terraform planets to suit your unique faction's needs.

name: Twilight Struggle
description: The ultimate Cold War duel. Replay decades of intrigue, prestige, and political maneuvering as the US or USSR in this card-driven strategy game.

name: Through the Ages: A New Story
description: Build your civilization from antiquity to the modern age. Manage resources, leaders, and military strength in one of the deepest strategy games ever designed.

name: Great Western Trail (2nd Ed)
description: Drive cattle from Texas to Kansas City. Hire cowboys, build structures, and manage your hand of cattle cards in this refined strategic journey.

name: The Castles of Burgundy
description: A classic dice-rolling and tile-placement game. Develop your 15th-century estate in the Loire Valley through trade, agriculture, and city building.

name: Scythe
description: Set in an alternate-history 1920s, lead your faction to power. Build mechs, harvest resources, and control territory in a world of engine-building and combat.

name: 7 Wonders Duel
description: The best head-to-head drafting game. Build your civilization, construct wonders, and race for military or scientific supremacy against a single opponent.

name: Brass: Lancashire
description: The original industrial strategy game. Build your empire in Lancashire during the industrial revolution through clever networking and market timing.

name: Nemesis
description: A cinematic semi-cooperative sci-fi horror survival. You and your crewmates must survive a ship infested with hostile organisms while completing secret objectives.

name: Heat: Pedal to the Metal
description: High-octane racing strategy where you manage your car's heat to push the limit. Features a campaign mode and modular weather systems for endless replayability.

name: Concordia
description: A peaceful strategy game of economic development in Roman times. Use a simple card mechanism to expand your trade network and please the gods.

name: Wingspan
description: A relaxing yet strategic bird-themed engine builder. Attract the best birds to your wildlife preserves to create powerful chains of actions.

name: Viticulture Essential Edition
description: Manage a vineyard in Tuscany. Assign workers to plant vines, harvest grapes, and fill wine orders in this beautiful and refined worker placement game.

name: Terra Mystica
description: Control one of 14 unique factions in a world of magic. Terraform the landscape and build structures to expand your influence without relying on luck.

name: Industrial Resource Kit (Brass Upgrade)
description: Upgrade your cardboard tokens with high-detail resin coal, iron, and beer barrels. Features realistic textures and weighted feel for an immersive industrial experience.

name: Deluxe Kiosk & Pavilion Set
description: Replace your flat tiles with 3D-printed kiosks and pavilions. These custom models fit perfectly on your player board and make your zoo layout pop visually.

name: Metallic Resource Cube Set
description: Solid metal cubes in Gold, Silver, and Copper finishes. Weighted for stability and designed to last through hundreds of Mars colonization sessions.

name: Glass Water Drop Tokens
description: Beautiful translucent blue glass droplets to represent the most precious resource on Arrakis. Smooth finish and elegant aesthetic.

name: Galactic Fleet Stands
description: Clear acrylic stands to help manage your massive fleets in space sectors. Helps differentiate ships from ground troops and prevents table clutter.

name: Acrylic Monster Standee Set
description: Crystal clear acrylic replacements for original cardboard monster standees. High-durability and better visibility for your dungeon tactical combat.

name: Single Replacement Mech (Assorted)
description: Individual replacement mechs for all Scythe factions. Lost a Polanian walker? We've got you covered with original-spec plastic miniatures.

name: Disease Cube Refill Pack
description: Essential replacement cubes for Pandemic. Includes the standard four colors (Red, Blue, Black, Yellow) in the original 8mm transparent style.

name: Shadow & Free Peoples Dice Set
description: Official replacement action dice for War of the Ring. Includes the unique icons for both the Shadow and Free Peoples armies.

name: Replacement Intruder Egg Set
description: Set of replacement plastic egg miniatures for the Nemesis nest. Matches the original sculpt and scale of the core game components.
